setting.title: Whatsapp Report - Trial
setting.columnlabels: Client,Contact Person,Mobile No,Email Id,Start Date,End Date,Assigned To,Status
setting.query: select $COLUMNS$ from ( select case when isnull(contacts_mobileno,'')='' then '' else '91'+contacts_mobileno end as mobileno, * from tbl_client left JOIN tbl_contacts on contacts_clientid=client_clientid LEFT JOIN tbl_employee on employee_employeeid=client_employeeid join tbl_subscriptionstatus on subscriptionstatus_subscriptionstatusid=client_subscriptionstatusid )r2
setting.where: isnull(mobileno,'')<>'' AND contacts_iswhatsappcommunication=1 AND client_subscriptionstatusid in(2,4) AND cast(client_whatsappenddate as date)>=cast(getdate() as date)
